name: Powerful Handheld Fabric Steamer - 1800W with Fast Ceramic Heat-Up Plate, 2-in-1 Ironing & Wrinkle Remover, Steam Nozzle, Lint Brush - Black, for US 120V Only
short_description: Superior steam power - 1800 watts of energy produces a powerful steam flow, quickly and efficiently removing wrinkles from your clothes.
Versatile and convenient - With a 300ml detachable water tank, this iron steamer can be used for both dry and wet ironing. Its 360-degree orientation design ensures no water leakage during use.
Safe to use - Equipped with 3-level safety protection against overheating and high temperatures, keeping your clothes and the iron steamer safe during operation.
Long-lasting steam - Enjoy continuous steam use for over 20 minutes thanks to the high-capacity tank, which saves you time and energy.

Essential Accessories included：Enhance your steam cleaning experience with the included fabric brush, heat-resistant gloves, and measuring cup. Achieve a pristine appearance on all of your belongings effortlessly.

Product Use Tips: In continuous work, the device will turn red, the steam output becomes smaller, this is to protect the product will not be overheated, resulting in equipment damage to the settings, the function can extend the service life of the device. After the boot needs to be warmed up, at this time to turn on the device will have water droplets leaking out, please then the device is heated up (show green light), and then turn on the steam mode.

name: BLACK+DECKER Compact Handheld Steamer, HGS012P, 25-Second Heat Up, 1000 Watts, Removes Wrinkles from Fabrics, Clothing and Upholstery
short_description: Compact Lightweight design: Its compact and lightweight design makes it easy to handle and store. It’s also ideal for travelling so you can ensure clothes will look their best wherever you go.
Powerful Steam Performance: With a powerful steam output of 15g/min with 6 minutes of continuous use wrinkles and creases won’t stand a chance.
Fast 30 Second Heat Up: Going places? With fast 30 second heat up you can start steaming in under a minute.

110 ml. Water Tank: A 110 ml. water tank means you can get up to 6 minutes of continuous steam time without stopping to top it up. And the tank is removable with a max fill line for easy refills when needed.
Easy view window: The water window lets you see at-a-glance how much water is in the tank without having to stop or open the appliance.
product_description: Garment care at home or on the go just got easier with the Black+Decker® Compact Handheld Garment Steamer. Its neat, lightweight design is ideal for travel or storage even if space is at a premium. In a hurry? It heats up in just 30 seconds so you won’t have long to wait to start steaming. Its pump heater generates efficient and powerful steam distribution and the 110 ml. water tank means you can enjoy up to 6 minutes of continuous use without having to refill. Whether you’re freshening clothes on the hanger, drapes or upholstery around the home, deep-seated wrinkles won’t stand a chance with this powerful appliance. Even pesky pieces of fluff and lint aren’t overlooked, thanks to a handy brush attachment, every steam-able fabric can look its best in just a few minutes.

name: Conair Handheld Garment Steamer for Clothes, Turbo ExtremeSteam 1875W, Portable Handheld Design, Strong Penetrating Steam, White / Champagne
short_description: Turbo Handheld Steamer: This steamer combines the performance of an iron with the power of steam to instantly smooth out wrinkles in clothing and upholstery while killing 99.9 percent of germs, dust mites and bed bugs.Material: Plastic.Special feature : Corded

Easy To Use: This freestanding steamer features a 40 second heat up and a 7.3 ounce water tank for up to 15 minutes of continuous steam; Quilted aluminum steamer plate and built in creaser perform like an iron for a fresh pressed look

3 In 1 Attachment: Includes a silicone band to pull fabric taut for better results, a delicate fabric spacer to protect trims and fine fabrics, and a bristle brush to ensure steam penetrates fibers for a perfect press, even on heavy fabrics
Conair Fabric Steamers: Our fabric steamers keep your garments, upholstery, curtains and other home textiles smooth and fresh; Check out entire line including handheld, upright and travel steamers
Innovative Garment Care: From fabric shavers and traditional irons to garment steamers, both handheld and full size/upright, we make high quality garment care tools for all users
product_description: Experience the most powerful handheld fabric steamer with the Conair Turbo Extreme Steam Hand Held Fabric Steamer (model GS59). Advanced steam technology is driven by an exclusive 1875-Watt steam generator. The steam is hotter and the results are faster! 5 steam settings from delicate to supercharged turbo allow users to instantly release wrinkles on any garment or fabric and the built-in creaser for perfect pleats and folds. With 40-second heat up and up to 20-minute steam time, this powerful Conair garment steamer is the #1 selling garment steamer in the USA. The 3-in-1 attachment has a silicone band to pull fabric taut for easier steaming, a delicate fabric spacer, and bristle brush to loosen fibers for faster steam penetration. Instantly release wrinkles, refresh upholstery, and give garments a professional, fresh-pressed look with the powerful Conair Turbo Extreme Steam Handheld Fabric Steamer. Kills 99.9% of Bacteria (Bacteria reduction rate was measured after exposing the tested bacteria samples for 1 minute at a 1cm distance from the garment steamer’s faceplate. Bacteria tested were Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) and Klebsiella pneumoniae).；The product voltage arrange is 110V
